TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Because you're in space, silly.

Waiter, why is Stephen Hawking in my soup?

Because you ordered the regular soup with extra IQ.

Waiter, there's a full-scale nuclear attack against the United States in my soup!

Sorry, it was meant to be the Moon. props to you if you get the reference...

Waiter, Titan's in my soup!

Sorry, our chef didn't know which type of titan you wanted.

WAITOR! There's a barcode in my soup!

Scan it, please!

WAITER! There's a waiter in my soup!

Yea, I know. *evil laugh*

Waiter, there's a DEFCON 1 situation in my soup!

DEFCON 1... Hmmm... Wait... you left your game disk here.

Waiter, there is Civilization: Beyond Earth in my soup!

I never bought that, someone else put it in your soup perhaps...

Waiter, there's a Mammoth Tank in my soup!

Well, we seem to have a bit of a situation on our hands, eh?

Waiter, there seems to be a "Mainsail" engine in my soup!

It adds spice.

Waiter, there's a space-time disrupted cat in my soup!

Resist the urge to touch it! Lest you want to be trapped in that moment of time *inhale*...... FOREVER!

Waiter! There's a Gabe Newell in my soup.

Try to drink it in two sips, not three.

Waiter! There's a Kerbal dance party in my soup!

Don't let the Kerbals drink it!

Waiter, there's Rocket Fuel in my soup!

I can deal with that (gets out lighter)

Waiter theres a....a ummmmmmm goat demon in my soup?

Edited August 6, 2014 by EnterStyx

no matter go play goat simulator, or carmaguedon it's fun as a game not to reproduce

waiter there's a bot educator in my soup.

Ugh, why does the chef have to put random people inside the Wednesday Non-Special soup?

Waiter, there's elvis dust in my soup!

Don't eat that. It provides music for the whole restaurant.

Waiter, there's a Kraken in my soup!

QUICK! Grab it before it starts shaking everything!

Waiter! There's Plutonium in my soup.

"There's just one explanation: a terrorist plot!" Simpsons quote for you there.

Waiter, there's a shark fin in my soup! Oh wait, this is a Japanese restaurant, and the special is shark fin soup, which I didn't know I was getting. Never mind!

Wait, where's the chef?

Waiter, there's a corpse of the chef AND a shark fin in my soup!

It's a new flavor... (Hides knife)

Waiter there's gold ring in my soup.

What ring?

*takes gold ring*

MY PRECIOUS!

Waiter, there's a volcano in my soup!

You ordered some hot coffee along with it, the chef must have dropped his coffeemaker into the soup. Sorry, let me get that ou-AHHH MY FINGERS THEY'RE MELTING-AGHGHHGHGHGUHHGH

Waiter, there's a dead pony drowned in my soup. Looks like it's Pinkie Pie.

Sorry. It seems to have originated from a forum somewhere on the internet. Let me replace it with some new soup. Also, would you like to try our new Premium SoupÃ¢â€žÂ¢ Enterprise Edition?

Waiter! There's a Polandball in my soup!

Edited August 7, 2014 by mythbusters844

I will take that.

waiter there's a WTF!!!??? WHAT IS THIS IN MY SOUP!
